channel.title: DevOps on d47zm3
channel.description: Recent content in DevOps on d47zm3

item.title: Create Github Pages Helm Repository
item.description: $ git clone git@github.com:d47zm3/helm-charts.git $ cd helm-charts $ mkdir src $ helm create src/test-chart $ helm package src/* $ helm repo index --url https://d47zm3.me/helm-charts/ . $ git add -A . && git commit -m "creating chart repository" && git push origin master $ # set up github pages from master branch $ helm repo add d47zm3 https://d47zm3.me/helm-charts/ $ # make changes $ helm repo index --url https://d47zm3.me/helm-charts/ --merge index.yaml . $ helm search repo test-chart
